text: Amazing color work! Jane really knows what she's doing. I came in with dark hair and left with beautiful blonde balayage. She took her time and made sure I was happy with every step.
aiSummary: Excellent color expertise. Highly recommended for balayage.

text: Great experience, very professional. My hair looks fantastic!
Michael gave me the best haircut I've ever had! He really listened to what I wanted and delivered perfectly. The fade is so clean!
aiSummary: Exceptional cutting skills. Highly attentive to client needs.

text: Sarah did my wedding hair and it was PERFECT! She's so talented and made me feel like a princess. All my bridesmaids looked amazing too!
aiSummary: Outstanding bridal hair specialist. Makes clients feel special.

text: Elite Hair Studio is amazing! Clean, professional, and the staff is so friendly. Highly recommend!
aiSummary: Clean and professional environment with friendly staff.

text: Love Modern Cuts! No pretentious vibe, just great haircuts at reasonable prices. Michael is the best!
